attributes.action: Voluntary and community work given to offenders posting bullying videos
attributes.additional_details: I want to give tougher penalties to schools and police and social media to take these videos off and issue fixed community orders to reabilitate our young generation and change their mind concepts so they realise there behaviour isn't acceptable and offer better education classes to educate them so they can see there current behaviour is wrong and that it will effect future employment and relationship prospects. Let's change the law and people's mind concepts to help others
attributes.background: Background is working with children, young people and families and seeing children go through the humiliation of being beaten and video then it appearing online for others to see and mock you, my daughter has had this happen and it has to stop our youth from thinking it's normal to post these videos

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
